dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3126 IH: Keep Kupuna Fed Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tokuda introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to exclude from income certain funds received under the Social Security Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keep Kupuna Fed Act.
Section 5(d) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2014(d)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (18) by striking and at the end,
in paragraph (19) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and, and
by adding at the end the following:
income received under title II of the Social Security Act.

section.text: This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
